issue.title: tv.canlitvvolo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://tv.canlitvvolo.com/canli/spor-tv-kanallari/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftv.canlitvvolo.com%2Fcanli%2Fspor-tv-kanallari%2F) ### Comment > There are gaps in the website left over from blocked ads. > > I used the following filters as a solution. > > ``` > tv.canlitvvolo.com##.d-md-block.d-sm-none > tv.canlitvvolo.com##div.container:nth-of-type(2) > tv.canlitvvolo.com##.lead > center > ``` > > Additional information: The following filter blocks the image in the video player of the link "https://tv.canlitvvolo.com/bein-sports-haber-canli-izle/" as an example. (It causes problems in broadcasts via Youtube) That's why I didn't use it. > > `tv.canlitvvolo.com##center` Username: `@punisher018` ### Screenshots
